tag_list: technology, ai, startups, mentor, advisor, entrepreneur
overview:
A Serial Entrepreneur, a Professional with international experience (Greece, UK) excellent background in Sales, business development and most of all a Technology expert.

Proven track record delivering results for Sales and Product Development positions. Considerable knowledge and experience in demanding environments in order to enable IT oriented Companies and Technology Startups and enhance their business services. Exceptional communication skills, a serial entrepreneur and a leader with the ability to spark innovation and inspire people.

Specialties Cloud Computing, Tecnology enablement, Sales, Business Management, Tech Consulting
